sentences.sContent: I hope one day I can sit on the green grassland and watch varicolored fireworks with my girlfriend.
sentences.sContent_eng: I hope one day I can sit on the green grassland and watch varicolored fireworks with my girlfriend.
sentences.sCn: 我希望有一天和我的女朋友坐在绿色的草地上看五颜六色的烟花。

sentences.sContent: A heavy cloth woven with rich, often varicolored designs or scenes, usually hung on walls for decoration and sometimes used to cover furniture.
sentences.sContent_eng: A heavy cloth woven with rich, often varicolored designs or scenes, usually hung on walls for decoration and sometimes used to cover furniture.
sentences.sCn: 一种上面织有颜色鲜艳，经常是有各种颜色的图案或风景的毯布，通常被挂在墙壁上作为装饰，有时也用来覆盖家俱。
